I'm Tanner!

A junior software dev
and current career changer.

I come from a background of ~8 years in hospitality, bringing with me valuable communication and teamwork skills. I am a husband, and father to a lovely baby girl. When I'm not at my desk or tending bar, You'll typically find me exploring the city with my family, dreaming about upgrading my gaming rig, or changing diapers.

I am a recent graduate of the Software Guild, completing their Full Stack Java track in '21-'22.

While the bulk of my programming knowledge lies with Java and some associated frameworks, I also have experience working with Javascript, HTML, CSS, and SQL. I have back end experience with Java and Spring frameworks, and front end experience in JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

You can find some of my projects over on my projects page, with links to code hosted on GitHub.
